Module com.example.batallanaval
Package com.example.batallanaval.model

Interface IBN

All Known Implementing Classes:
BN
public interface IBN
Since:
09-12-2025 Interface that defines the core methods for the Naval Battle game model. Provides methods to create visual elements and display alerts for game states.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
David AlejandroBravo Ospina

      Returns:
